content: वृषली {@--1@} An unmarried girl twelve years old; particularly, a girl remaining unmarried at her father's house in whom menstruation has commenced; पितुर्गेहे च या नारी रजः पश्यत्यसंस्कृता . भ्रूणहत्या पितुस्तस्याः सा कन्या वृषली स्मृता ... {@--2@} A woman during menstruation. {@--3@} A barren woman. {@--4@} The mother of a stillborn child. {@--5@} A Śūdra female, or the wife of a Śūdra.
